info.title: CXone Authentication Service
info.description:
The following endpoints are part of the **global CXone authentication service**. This service
is a cross-tenant global service which authenticates and authorizes all CXone users. The service
is used by all applications including those written by partners, integrators, and customers. All
applications that use CXone APIs use bearer tokens, and this service is the only way that those
can be obtained.
This service operates globally but has two distinct instances that are separate. The difference
is to support U.S. Federal Government (FedRAMP) customers. All other users, globally, use the
same instance while FedRAMP customers use a separate, U.S.-only instance.
